name: bradley afghan
notes:
***snuggle under the gentle, geometric pattern of the bradley afghan.*** three colors of bulky weight yarn are combined in this chevron moss stitch blanket pattern to help point the way to a cozy netflix binge session. grab your favorite snack and curl up under your new favorite afghan.

find the free version of the bradley afghan [here][1].
pattern includes a full tutorial video.

materials
-1270 total yards bulky weight wool blend yarn (sample made with lion brand hue + me
-10mm crochet hook
-scissors
-tapestry needle
-locking stitch markers

techniques
-basic crochet stitches
-increasing and decreasing
-color changes

measurements
one size - 50" long x 45" wide
